Name: Tequila'tini
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Even with its generous splash of sugar syrup this cocktail is surprisingly dry.
Nutrition: One serving of Tequila'tini contains 179 calories
